text:
I'm a book author based in Singapore and I had the best experience with Ho Printing metal offset printing job that they did for my publication.
My photography book required very meticulous printing job to convey correct colours and they did the most perfect job possible given that it was a few thousands of copies.
Great communication and technical support throughout from the Ho Printing team were unparalleled. To insure the quality they provided multiple proofs and retakes until they got my photography colours correctly for the book production.
Highly satisfied with the experience and I am recommending Ho Printing to everyone.

Worth every star! As an agency, we will definitely make use of Ho Printing again and also recommend them to our clients. Thank you Annie and Yee for delivering within the timeline and budget and also for walking the extras mile to get the shipping sorted.

I can highly recommend Ho Printing Singapore! I am a New Zealand author who has had two books printed at the company. The quality of the books was excellent (one was full colour, and the other black and white). The service and communication of Wah Yuen Ho and his team was also absolutely superb. I have really enjoyed my experience dealing with Ho Printing and  I have no hesitation in recommending them - in fact I continue to do so regularly to others in the writing community here. Keep up the great work team! I look forward to having more books printed with you in the future.

Choosing Ho Printing was the best choice I made. Lilian was exceptionally patient and helpful, ready to answer all of my questions and taking the initiative to provide me updates. I am floored by their excellent service, right from the first point of contact with the salesperson, dealing with Lilian with regards to printing, and the courier service (which is always on time!). Thank you Ho Printing and Lilian for the commendable service!

My good fortune was to engage Ho Printing for the task of printing a biography of Spanish golfer Seve Ballesteros. The company was a joy to work with, ever-professional, and it always got the important details correct.
My two contacts at the company were Annie Ho and Yuet Mei, who kept me updated on all important developments along the journey.
I wouldnâ€™t hesitate to recommend Ho Printing for your next print assignment.
